metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0886 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the crypt_raw method in the key-stretchingimplementation in jBCrypt before 0.4 makes it easier for remote attackersto determine cleartext values of password hashes via a brute-force attackagainst hashes associated with the maximum exponent.

criterions.comment: libjbcrypt-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
